oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Miller interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Miller, Andrew; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Col. Andrew Miller was a USAF navigator in a KC-135, in-country in late 1971 and in 1972. Many of his flights were dedicated to mid-air refueling of other aircraft.
